meanings.definition: A small part or item that is considered separately from the whole
meanings.sent1: The toy had a tiny detail on its arm.
meanings.sent2: The painting was full of intricate details.
meanings.sent3: The detective noticed a small detail that cracked the case wide open.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a puzzle with missing details.
meanings.sent5: The jewelry designer paid attention to every detail to create a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To describe or explain something thoroughly and carefully
meanings.sent1: She will detail the plan for the project tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: Please detail your experience in the report.
meanings.sent3: He decided to detail his day in a journal.
meanings.sent4: The teacher detailed the instructions for the experiment.
meanings.sent5: The scientist detailed the findings of the research in a paper.

meanings.definition: To include or list all the small parts or features of something
meanings.sent1: The manual will detail all the steps to assemble the furniture.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to detail all the ingredients in the recipe.
meanings.sent3: He will detail the components of the machine in the presentation.
meanings.sent4: The brochure detailed the amenities of the resort.
meanings.sent5: The architect detailed the specifications of the building in the blueprint.
